title: Mahjong.Escape.Ancient.China-SKIDROW
description:
Mahjong.Escape.Ancient.China-SKIDROW

> T H E L E A D i N G F O R C E <



proudly presents

Mahjong Escape: Ancient China / Focus Multimedia

RELEASE DATE: 09-12-2008 PROTECTION: Nothing

GAME TYPE: Puzzle DISKS: 1 CD



Release Notes:



Take a mahjong adventure all the way to ancient

China!



Match magic gold tiles and explore 11 dynasties as you unlock

ancient Chinese wisdom and collect lost dynasty treasures. Be

sure to relax and enjoy the scenery along the way: you&#039;ve

never seen mahjong like this!



A 4000-year journey of collecting treasure



Over 175 levels for lots of relaxing fun



Gorgeous hand-painted backgrounds



Two unique game modes: Dynasty Adventure and Classic Mahjong

solitaire



Point-boosting power-up tiles (Keys, Locks, Magnets and

more)



Unlimited hints & shuffles



Soothing graphics and sounds



Install Notes:



1. Unpack release

2. Mount image or burn it

3. Install game

4. Play the game
